amendment.description: An amendment numbered 137 printed in Part B of House Report 118-272 to prohibit funds from being used to establish, implement, or enforce any vaccine mandate.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Santos amendment (A079) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Santos amendment (A079) Agreed to by voice vote.
